name: ShowMePantry
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: show me pantry
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Show Me Pantry is a skill designed to help subscribed users order supplemental nutrition from their participating food pantry. There is no charge for this service or for the food requested.

This skill requires that they are a member of the Show Me Pantry system for supplemental nutrition. If you are a member a Show Me Pantry administrator will setup your device in your home. They will directly provide you the credential that will link your device with the Show Me Pantry system at showmepantry.org. This skill does require account linking to work. 

This system does not use the Amazon Pay system in any way.
